title: Online Self-Directed Learning Program for Enhancing NCS Basic Job Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Office/Administrative Task Theory and Practical Work Experience
context.additional_context: Learners experience job-related scenarios in simulation/VR environments using personal devices and selectively learn required competency modules

learning_goals: Learners can select and explain situational applications for five or more of the NCS 10 core job competencies in simulation/VR environments
Utilizing an online self-directed learning system, learners can analyze three or more practical case studies per week and incorporate feedback.
Through formative assessment, learners can achieve at least 80% proficiency in NCS job competencies and develop improvement plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
